pull_requests.title: BIP-322: fix proof-of-funds inputs wording
pull_requests.body: The Signing section previously stated that signers may add additional outputs to to_sign for proving control of funds. This contradicts the Full (Proof of Funds) subsection, which specifies that the claimed UTXOs must be included as additional inputs of to_sign and validated against the current UTXO set, and also conflicts with the requirement that to_sign has exactly one output (an OP_RETURN).

pull_requests.title: BIP158, refactor: remove duplicate conditional
pull_requests.body: Removes redundant duplicate condition check that was evaluating the same block height twice in the test vector generation loop.

comment_list.body:
> ACK, refactoring only
